title: Super Detective Kid â€“ A child solves mini-mysteries in their neighborhood.

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Neighborhood street, Character Action: A child named Alex with a magnifying glass inspects a mysterious set of footprints, Dialogue: 'These footprints are fresh... but where do they lead?', Narration: 'Alex, the neighborhood detective, was always on the lookout for clues.'

output.Dialogue: 'These footprints are fresh... but where do they lead?'
output.Narration: Alex, the neighborhood detective, was always on the lookout for clues.

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Backyard fence, Character Action: Alex peers over the fence into a neighbor's backyard, Dialogue: 'I think they went this way!', Narration: 'The footprints led Alex to the neighbor's yard.'

output.Dialogue: 'I think they went this way!'
output.Narration: The footprints led Alex to the neighbor's yard.

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Backyard, Character Action: Alex climbs over the fence, Dialogue: 'This mystery is too good to pass up!', Narration: 'Alex was always ready to take risks for a good mystery.'

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Garden, Character Action: Alex spots a cat with a shiny object in its mouth, Dialogue: 'Hey! What do you have there?', Narration: 'The culprit was closer than Alex expected.'

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Shed interior, Character Action: Alex notices something shiny behind the cat, Dialogue: 'What's that behind you?', Narration: 'It seemed the cat was guarding something important.'

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Shed interior, Character Action: Alex reaches behind the cat and pulls out a shiny bracelet, Dialogue: 'Aha! A missing bracelet!', Narration: 'The mystery was starting to unravel.'

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Backyard, Character Action: Alex exits the shed, holding the bracelet, Dialogue: 'I need to return this to Mrs. Thompson.', Narration: 'Alex knew exactly who the bracelet belonged to.'

story.input: Create a comic book panel with: Setting: Mrs. Thompson's porch, Character Action: Alex rings the doorbell, holding the bracelet, Dialogue: 'Mrs. Thompson, I found your bracelet!', Narration: 'The case of the missing bracelet was coming to a close.'
